Name: Economy
Description: The Economy Tree focuses on economic activities within the your city

Name: Specialist
Description: The Specialist Tree focuses on modifying your Specialists' progression

Name: Combat
Description: The Combat Tree focuses on specialist combat strength

Name: Missions
Description: The Mission Tree focuses on missions and modifying their parameters

Name: Street Rep
Description: The Street Reputation Tree grants bonuses related to overt and overpowering action

Name: Shadow Rep
Description: The Shadow Reputation Tree grants bonuses related to subtlety and leadership

Name: Player Tree
Description: This is an example of what the player skill tree could look like
